page.title: 10Supernatural - Cronton
page.content: Pex Hill Cross; This cross was erected to commemerate the death of Peg Pussey but it was destroyed in 1868 when the reservoir was built. Peg Pusseys ghost; About 300 years ago a farmers daughter was murdered by a young man from Cronton Hall. She was enticed to the top of the hill and thrown down. Her ghost haunts the place. The witch; Another legend descibes how she was cast off by her lover and in her despair went to see him at Cronton Hall. The door was slammed in her face - she went mad and rambled about Pex or 'Peg's' hill until she died. Hence the origin of her being a witch. Superstition; led the people who lived around the foot of Pex Hill to believe that it was haunted by a band of elves hence Pixies Hill. "Ne let the pouke nor other evil sprites, Fray us with things that be not".
